body_html:
@Carmezim We already include a link to common installations page (which links to the script) in the error message itself, so I'm not sure people would read it if it were in the issue template :).

We're working on better error messages for the Windows build, and hope to have something in 1.4 that should help cut down on these issues!

body:
@Carmezim We already include a link to common installations page (which links to the script) in the error message itself, so I'm not sure people would read it if it were in the issue template :).

We're working on better error messages for the Windows build, and hope to have something in 1.4 that should help cut down on these issues!
